mapper.select: SELECT J.CUSTOMER_CODE as customerCode, S.REPORTING_DATE as reportingDate, J.SLIP_NO as slipNo, J.ACCOUNT_INNER_CODE as accountCode, A.ACCOUNT_NAME as accountName, J.BALANCE_DIVISION as balanceDivision, S.EXPENSE_REPORT AS expenseReport, NVL(J.LEFT_DEBTOR_PRICE,0) as leftDebtorPrice, NVL(J.RIGHT_CREDITS_PRICE,0) as rightCreditsPrice, J.JOURNAL_NO as journalNo FROM SLIP S, JOURNAL J, ACCOUNT A WHERE J.SLIP_NO = S.SLIP_NO AND J.ACCOUNT_INNER_CODE = A.ACCOUNT_INNER_CODE AND S.REPORTING_DATE BETWEEN #{fromDate} AND #{toDate} AND S.SLIP_STATUS = '승인완료' ORDER BY S.REPORTING_DATE ASC, S.SLIP_NO ASC

SELECT J.JOURNAL_NO as journalNo, J.SLIP_NO as slipNo, J.BALANCE_DIVISION as balanceDivision, J.ACCOUNT_INNER_CODE as accountCode, J.CUSTOMER_CODE as customerCode, J.LEFT_DEBTOR_PRICE as leftDebtorPrice, J.RIGHT_CREDITS_PRICE as rightCreditsPrice, A.ACCOUNT_NAME as accountName FROM JOURNAL J, ACCOUNT A WHERE J.ACCOUNT_INNER_CODE = A.ACCOUNT_INNER_CODE AND J.SLIP_NO = #{slipNo} ORDER BY J.JOURNAL_NO
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO JOURNAL ( JOURNAL_NO, SLIP_NO, BALANCE_DIVISION, ACCOUNT_INNER_CODE, CUSTOMER_CODE, RIGHT_CREDITS_PRICE, LEFT_DEBTOR_PRICE )VALUES( #{journalNo}, #{slipNo}, #{balanceDivision}, #{accountCode}, #{customerCode}, #{rightCreditsPrice}, #{leftDebtorPrice} )
mapper.select: select J.JOURNAL_NO as journalNo, J.JOURNAL_DETAIL_NO as journalDetailNo, J.DESCRIPTION AS journalDescription, A.ACCOUNT_CONTROL_TYPE as accountControlType, A.ACCOUNT_CONTROL_NAME as accountControlName, A.ACCOUNT_CONTROL_CODE as accountControlCode, A.DESCRIPTION AS accountControlDescription from journal_detail J, account_control_detail A where J.account_control_code=A.account_control_code and J.journal_no= #{journalNo}

SELECT acd.ACCOUNT_CONTROL_CODE , acd.ACCOUNT_CONTROL_NAME , acd.ACCOUNT_CONTROL_TYPE , acd.DESCRIPTION FROM ACCOUNT_CONTROL_DETAIL acd , ACCOUNT_CONTROL_CODE acc WHERE acc.ACCOUNT_INNER_CODE = #{accountCode} AND acc.ACCOUNT_CONTROL_CODE = acd.ACCOUNT_CONTROL_CODE ORDER BY acd.ACCOUNT_CONTROL_CODE
SELECT C.DETAIL_CODE_NAME FROM JOURNAL_DETAIL J, CODE_DETAIL C WHERE J.DESCRIPTION = C.DETAIL_CODE AND J.JOURNAL_DETAIL_NO = #{journalDetailNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE JOURNAL_DETAIL SET DESCRIPTION = #{journalDescription} WHERE JOURNAL_DETAIL_NO = #{journalDetailNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO JOURNAL_DETAIL( JOURNAL_NO, JOURNAL_DETAIL_NO, ACCOUNT_CONTROL_CODE, DESCRIPTION )VALUES( #{journalNo}, JOURNAL_DD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{accountControlCode}, #{description} )
